articles.title: AMD's New Radeon Pro GPUs to Boost MacBook Pro Performance - Yahoo Finance
articles.description: AMD's new Pro 5600M Mobile GPU, customized for 16-inch MacBook Pro laptops, comes with robust features designed to support a diverse range of complex workloads.
articles.content:

articles.title: Verizon offers 5G PC from Lenovo with new 5G device data plan - FierceWireless
articles.description: Verizon is adding a new 5G device to its lineup, this time the world’s first 5G PC from Lenovo, with a new $30 per month 5G device data plan.
articles.content:
Verizon is adding a new 5G device to its lineup, this time the worlds first 5G PC from Lenovo, with a new $30 per month 5G device data plan.
